# Alfreton War Memorial

| location = Alfreton, Derbyshire, England
| designation1 = Grade II
| designation1_offname = War Memorial
| designation1_date = 25 May 1988
| delisted1_date =
| designation1_parent =

Alfreton War Memorial is a 20th-century grade II listed war memorial in Alfreton, Derbyshire.
History
The war memorial was unveiled on 31 July 1927, with Gen Sir Horace Smith-Dorrien in attendance.
The memorial and the surrounding railings have been Grade II listed since 25 May, 1988.

* Listed buildings in Alfreton
